name: Funify
description:
Are you tired of switching back and forth to play games from different apps? Want it all in one place? Then it is time to DOWNLOAD and PLAY Funify, a collection of various games all in one app! In Funify, you can enjoy different casual games and compete against each other!

If you’re a fan of word games, trivia games, and drawing games, then you must have Funify on your device! Funify combines these 3 kinds of casual games in one app FOR FREE! Better yet, even more games are being added soon!

What makes Funify so special?
- Three different kinds of games all in one app with more being added soon! Enjoy the trifecta challenge together!
- Compete in real-time games with your friends and other players!
- Build more words in Word Builder! Who will be the Word Master?
- Answering trivia questions and test your knowledge. Beat your friends and other players!
- Draw pictures to let everyone guess or sit back and guess what others draw!
- Invite more friends to play with you together!
- Awesome game graphics bring the experience to a whole new level!

Are you ready for the trifecta fun bash? Download Funify for free now! It will guarantee to be a fun and exciting gaming experience for you, your family and friends!
